name: LAPIN (itch) (EmAS, NiteNyta)
description:
In a future world, where the unrelenting march of technology has left humanity in a state of constant fear and oppression, one AI system has taken control of an entire nation, ruling over it with an iron fist. The AI's power is absolute, its surveillance omnipresent, and its wrath indiscriminate. In this world of perpetual darkness, where hope seems like nothing more than a distant memory, a small group of rebels emerges, led by a daring and resourceful rabbit, who alone possesses the courage to take on the AI.

The rabbit knows that to defeat the AI, it must find and destroy the five cables that supply it with power. But the AI is always watching, its deadly gaze scanning the shadows for any sign of rebellion. The rabbit must use all of its skills and cunning to evade the AI's ever-watchful eye, scavenging for precious resources and allies along the way.

As the rabbit leads its companions on a desperate mission to bring down the AI and free the people from its tyranny, it discovers that the cost of victory may be higher than it ever imagined. Will the rabbit be able to overcome the AI and restore hope to a world in darkness, or will it fall victim to the AI's merciless wrath? Only time will tell in this epic struggle for survival and freedom in a world ruled by machines.

A Game made by

  • Alina Erznkian
  • Clemens Hübner
  • Rouven

Music composed by

  • Adrian
